import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../services/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carrito', templateUrl: './carrito.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carrito.component.css'] }) export class CarritoComponent implements OnInit { cartItems: any[] = []; savedItems: any[] = []; cartSummary: { numberOfProducts: number; totalPrice: number } = { numberOfProducts: 0, totalPrice: 0 }; randomShippingCost: number = 0; constructor(private cartService: CartService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadCart(); this.loadSavedItems(); this.updateCartSummary(); this.generateRandomShippingCost(); } loadCart(): void { this.cartItems = this.cartService.getCartItems(); } loadSavedItems(): void { this.savedItems = this.cartService.getSavedItems(); } updateCartSummary(): void { this.cartSummary = this.cartService.getCartSummary(); } generateRandomShippingCost(): void { // Generates a random number greater than 2000 (between 2001 and 3000 for example) this.randomShippingCost = Math.floor(Math.random() * (3000 - 2001 + 1)) + 2001; } removeFromCart(index: number): void { this.cartService.removeCartItem(index); this.loadCart(); // Reload cart after removal this.updateCartSummary(); // Update summary } saveToCart(item: any): void { this.cartService.saveProduct(item); this.loadCart(); // Reload cart after saving this.loadSavedItems(); // Reload saved items this.updateCartSummary(); // Update summary } }
